name: Light The Lamp Hockey
description:
Old School Hockey Gaming in a Beer league coat of paint! Welcome to the most dynamic 8-ish bit hockey experience you could have ever asked for.
Built on simplicity and full of depth, Take your team to the playoffs and win the almighty 'Ship!

FEATURES


Beer League Hockey full of Beer League Events! Blown calls, Quick Whistles, Busy Players!
3 on 3 Arcade gameplay, Best with friends and family!

DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY


Each game plays differently!
Bouncing Pucks, Loss of puck control, Quick Whistles,
Aggressive AI, Goalies are... uh GOALIES! and Player form changes.

EASY TO PLAY!

Simple 2 button game play, Much like the 8 bit games of old.


MODES

Franchise Mode: 10 Seasons of Beer League Goodness (Coming Soon)

Arcade Mode: Quick Games and Ranking Systems to break up your day!

OTHER FEATURES


Team Creator | import your beer league into the game!
Modable Music | Customize your game with the music you want!
And Much Much MORE!
